/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the cityscape. The buildings, mostly white and gray, rise in the background, their red roofs adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. In the distance, a few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still image.
